themes: concern about exclusion of legacy organizations
value of historical and traditional arts
support for expanding funding to underrepresented groups
perceived loss of support for established organizations
questioning the balance of funding priorities
key_phrases: I support the focus on expanding the art funding to those organizations that have been excluded
the 'baby has been thrown out with the bath water'
My organization, the Austin Symphonic Band, plays band music
we still play old fashioned Sousa marches

barriers_identified: exclusion of legacy arts organizations from funding
solutions_proposed: support arts that are historically significant to our city
